Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to reporting on investigations relating to the police department
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reporting on investigations relating to the police department.

Items.Title: Resolution directing the Department of Investigation to conduct an investigation to ascertain the knowledge possessed by mayoral administrations on environmental toxins produced by the September 11, 2001 terrorist attacks on the World Trade Center and to submit a report to the Council thereon.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: DOI conduct an investigation to ascertain the knowledge possessed by mayoral administrations on environmental toxins produced by the September 11, 2001 terrorist attacks on the World Trade Center and to submit a report to the Council thereon.
